verbose_text: Conform reduced presence of the IL-2Ralpha on the cell surface upon T cell activation, the IL-2 response mediated by phosphorylation of signal transducer and activator of transcription (Stat) 5 was 2DG dose-dependently reduced in Th17 cells (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C).
